duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage maintenance schedule and ensure high-quality work is performed while adhering to delivery schedules.
Communicate with service vendors as appropriate, when outsourcing of work is necessary.
Make the appropriate recommendations for the outsourcing of work to ensure the optimization of service efficiency while minimizing overall costs.
Responsible for performing diagnostic inspections on general truck-tractor systems utilizing mechanical and design software diagnostics.
Ability to complete preventative maintenance inspection of truck-tractor components.
Responsible for making repairs to truck-tractor components.
Complete the required paperwork to reflect hours, parts, and lube, utilized within each job function.
Make road calls when component failure is in a remote location.
Ability to coordinate truck arrival and departures including receipt of proper documentation and lot parking assignments.
Ability to work in a team-based environment and work with little to no supervision.
Provide superior customer service to clients.
Order parts for trucks and stock.
Perform inventory management audits for all parts.
Support Used Truck Center Manager with responsibilities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required.
